_description: Christ weeps in the cradle for man’s sin — seven quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Lullay lullay litel child / qwi wepest þou so sore’

BLHar7358.First Lines:
Lollay lollay þu lytel chyld wy wepys þu so soreÞu
                    þat were so sterne & wyldÞu art bycome meck &
                    myldWyþ þe marye þat wente with chyld…
BLHar7358.Last Lines:
…Ȝet þu schall suffry peynys moIn herte in fot &
                    hondes toIc wot y wys þat ys al soTo sauy þat were
                    forlore
BLHar7358.Note: 6 stanzas = 1, 2, 4, 3, 5, 6 of Edinburgh,  National Library of Scotland, Advocates’ 18.7.21.
BLHar7358.Editions:
Heuser,  Wilhelm. 
             Die Kildare-Gedichte…
Bonner Beiträge zur Anglistik
         14. Bonn: P. Hanstein, 1904: 2011-12.

NLS18721.First Lines:
Lullay lullay litel childÞu þat were so sterne &
                    wild…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…þat pine vs helpe ay to fleþe wikede fendes lore
                    Amen
